selectDateAndTimeBody: Pick your departure time. Select the date and time for your journey effortlessly
chooseTheRouteBody: Select your preferred route. Find the best path to your destination with ease.
travelBody: Begin your journey. Join rides, connect with drivers and passengers, and enjoy the trip
howDoYouWantToContinueAs: How do you want to continue as?
howDoYouWantToContinueAsBody: You can login as a driver or a traveller, select one to continue

youAccountUnderReview: Thanks for registering Your account is now under review
baggageAllowed: Baggage up to size L is allowed
